Questions.question: What is your loved one’s current situation?
options: Soon to be discharged from hospital

Questions.question: Which one of the following best describes your loved one’s physical condition at home?
options: Moving around with or without assistance
May or may not require help and/or supervision to move around such as walking aids
Always on the bed and requires help in all activities of daily living
Requires help with moving about in wheelchair even at home

Questions.question: Which of the following best describes your loved one’s medical condition?
options: Physically weaker in the past 6 months (e.g. due to fall, amputation, or reduced strength)
Mental health symptoms or conditions (diagnosed by doctor to have depression, anxiety, psychosis, etc.)
Requires nursing care (e.g. wound care, feeding tube, urinary catheter)
Last stage of life (Diagnosed by doctor with prognosis of less than 1 year)

Questions.question: Which of the following caregiving support will help you in caring for your loved one?
options: Community services (e.g. Day Care, Home Care, etc.)
I’m not sure and would like to speak to someone

Questions.question: What support services do your loved one need at home?
options: Meal delivery (e.g. delivering food to your loved one at home)
Light housekeeping (e.g. sweeping floor and laundry)
Eldersitting (e.g. someone to take care of my loved one when I’m unavailable)

Questions.question: Which of the following future plans (i.e. financial, legal and health plans) have you made for your loved one?
options: Lasting Power of Attorney (LPA) or Deputyship

Questions.question: What is your loved one’s citizenship status?
options: Permanent Resident (PR) with Singaporean immediate family members

Questions.question: Is your loved one a Pioneer Generation card holder?
Which policies are your loved one covered under?
Does your loved one have any balance in their MediSave account?
Do your loved one and any household members staying with your loved one have income?
What is the estimated annual value of the property based on your loved one’s NRIC address?
